data.quote: Don't get set into one form, adapt it and build your own, and let it grow, be like water
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: To dream of the person you would like to be is to waste the person you are.

data.quote: Keep going. Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end
data.author: Roy T. Bennet

data.quote: You're braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think
data.author: Winnie the Pooh
